body:
hello,

i was following the install instructions in this link ( [https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/blob/master/resources/I...](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/blob/master/resources/Installation_Instructions.md) )

and was wondering if it's possible to install smoothly honeybee on another drive than C:\.

since it is specified, i am uncertain that by changing the path i create mess.



thanks
